title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: run Llama 3, Phi 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally with a simple CLI and REST API.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for Ollama: chat, generate, embed, pull and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama: browser, Node and Deno support with full TypeScript definitions.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: PyPI package adding Ollama support to LangChain: use any Ollama model as an LLM or chat component.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama: chat interface, model management, RAG with document upload, dark/light themes.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that pipes chat into your local Ollama instance; supports streaming, threads and slash commands.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama + LangChain + Chroma: ingest PDFs and chat locally in <5 min.

title: ollama-cli-chat
summary: Terminal chat UI with history, syntax highlighting and markdown preview for Ollama.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns Ollama into a GitHub-Copilot-like inline assistant.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin SDK for Ollama: sync/async APIs, fluent builders, Spring Boot starter.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration: use Ollama models as generators or chatters in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes for Ollama: function-calling, vision, fine-tuning, Docker Compose stacks.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake for reproducible Ollama deployments: pinned models, systemd services, GPU flags.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for running Ollama in Kubernetes with GPU support and PVC model cache.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama: idiomatic Ruby client with streaming and model management.

title: ollama-dotnet
summary: Community-maintained .NET SDK for Ollama: supports .NET 6+ with async enumerables.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds Ollama-powered AI commands inside your notes.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot server that forwards channel messages to Ollama and streams replies back.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate for Ollama: async/tokio, typed requests, serde models.

title: ollama-zig
summary: Zig client library for Ollama: zero-dependency HTTP wrapper with build.zig integration.
